name: D
caption: Average demand per unit of time
message: The average demand per unit of time must be positive.

name: S
caption: Fixed ordering/ setup cost
message: The fixed ordering/setup cost must be positive.

name: h
caption: Unit holding cost per unit of time
message: The unit holding cost per unit of time must be positive.

name: Pi
caption: Backorder cost per unit short
message: The backorder cost per unit short must be positive.

name: Pi0
caption: Unit marginal profit
message: The unit marginal profit must be non-negative.

name: beta
caption: Fraction of shortages backordered
message: The fraction of shortage backordered must be in the interval [0, 1].

name: UD
caption: Demand
message: The demand values must be integer values entered in ascending order.

name: UP
caption: Probability
message: The probability values must sum to one.
